promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a young basic fox fighting-type pokemon wearing stone armor. It can be found in arena-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or fox. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Stonefoxin, a a young basic fox fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in arena-like environments It has the following abilities: Giant Tusk, Lucky Find. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "fox", "fighting" or "Stonefoxin". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, fox-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, red and purple ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This nimble combatant, known as Stonefoxin, thrives in coliseum habitats. With sturdy tusks and a flair for treasure-hunting, it always catches a lucky break.
